sqlMap.sql: ID, APPNO, NUM, MONITOR_PROTOCOL_NO, PROTOCOL_CODE, SLAVE_CONTNO, SLAVE_CONTCODE, CUSTCD, MONI_OF_CUSTCD, NOTICE_TYPE, MORTGAGE_CHANGE_TYPE, BRCODE, MONI_OF_DATE, APPLI_DATE, MONI_OF_NAME, TLRN, STATUS, BAIL_AMOUNT, PLEDGE_MODE, MAST_CONTNO, COMMON_AMT, ORDER_NO, COMMON_NUM, MAST_CONTCODE, CUST_NAME, OTHER_CUSTCD, OTHER_CUST_NAME, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACCOUNT_NO, DEPOSIT_BRCODE, RATIO, TRADE_CONTNO, DEBET_NO, DEBET_ID, PROTOCOL_NO, SIGN_DATE, COMMON_DATE, EXT1_AMOUNT, EXT2_AMOUNT, EXT1, EXT2, BUSS_TYPE, PAYEE, REMARK, DEPOSIT_BRNAME, LINKMAN, TELEPHONE, FAX, TONS, AMT, DELIVERY_QUANTITY, DELIVERY_AMT, BALANCE_AMT, PRICE_DROP_RATE
sqlMap.select:
select
distinct
from B_NTE_NOTICE_BASE
order by $orderByClause$

select
from B_NTE_NOTICE_BASE where SIGN_DATE is not null
CUSTCD in(select CUSTCD from B_CRM_BASE_INFO M where M.CNAME like '%' || #sallerName# || '%')
MAST_CONTNO = #mastContno:VARCHAR#
BUSS_TYPE = #bussType:VARCHAR#
NOTICE_TYPE = #noticeType:VARCHAR#
NOTICE_TYPE in
#noticeTypes[]#
STATUS = #status:VARCHAR#
BRCODE = #brcode:VARCHAR#
SIGN_DATE >= #startQf:VARCHAR#
SIGN_DATE <= #endQf:VARCHAR#
COMMON_DATE >= #startHz:VARCHAR#
COMMON_DATE <= #endHz:VARCHAR#
order by SIGN_DATE desc
